text: TikTok collects information you provide, including profile information, user content (videos, comments, messages), and payment information. We automatically collect technical information including IP address, device identifiers, and usage data. We also infer information about your interests based on your activity.
sharing: We share data with ByteDance companies, service providers, business partners, advertisers (aggregated), and for legal compliance. Data may be transferred internationally including to China.
retention: We retain information for as long as necessary to provide services. Deleted content may remain in backups for up to 90 days. Some data retained longer for legal purposes.
concerns: Young user base with extensive data collection
